date-time.rules: value => (!!value && value.indexOf('_') === -1) || 'Please enter a valid date of birth.', value => !value || value.indexOf('_') !== -1 || moment(value,'MM-DD-YYYY').add(18,'y') < Date.now() || 'Applicants must be at least 18 years of age to apply for an account.', value => moment(value,'MM-DD-YYYY') > moment().subtract(130,'y') || 'Please enter a valid date of birth.'

text-line.rules: value => (value >= 0 && value <= 100) || 'Please enter a number between 0 and 100.'
value => (value >= 0 && value <= 11) || 'Please enter a number between 0 and 11.'
